api_list.name: GET New Hashtags
GET Hashtags
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-instagram-hashtag.p.rapidapi.com/hashtags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-instagram-hashtag.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET Hashtag

required_parameters.name: tag

api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://top-instagram-hashtag.p.rapidapi.com/hashtag/{tag}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-instagram-hashtag.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
